fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Gastric Acid (1-shot): Deal a Basic Attack to a player. If they survive, you will set their Defense to None and prevent any Protective roles from visiting them for the following night. **Locked**: Gain 2 additional shots.
-Overgrowth (1-shot): Astrally target a player. They will be roleblocked and unable to whisper or speak the next day. **Locked**: Gain 2 additional shots.
-Dissolve (**Locked**, 1-shot): Target a player and name a role. If that player is that role, they will be hit by an Astral Overkill attack. If this fails, the ammo will not be refunded.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Players killed by you will appear as **Melted by Bgeln**
-**Unlock Condition**: If any player claims (by host determination) a Power (or factional equivalent) role belonging to a ‘Good’ faction, Unlock.
